name: Ali Roshan
body:
### About me
I am a professional web developer. Computer programming is my passion and that's the reason why ended up in this field. I have worked mostly with PHP, some decent time with Python and a humble work in C++ game development.

Some open source software I work with:
```
Wordpress
OpenCart
Joomla
```

Some of the technologies I wish to work on:
```
Node.JS
Magento
```

### Contact
Email Address: aliroshan@live.com
Skype: ali.roshan5
